attributes.action: Have Sarah Kennedy replaced on the Dawn Patrol on BBC Radio 2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sarah Kennedy presents the Dawn Patrol on BBC Radio 2 & has done so for at least the past 13 years. Her style of broadcasting is out of touch with the modern era, & it it is time she was replaced with someone more up to date & preferably younger. 
This pettion seeks to have her removed fro BBC Radio 2

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
